about_the_game: This DLC will provide you will the complete art book to view in game via the in-game phone app, giving you an easy look at artwork from the game whenever you want as you play.

content_descriptors.notes:
This product includes various images showcasing female characters in the nude or performing sexual acts.

All characters included are over the age of 21.

The DLC adds new content to the game: Maid Cafe.

detailed_description: This DLC will provide you will the complete art book to view in game via the in-game phone app, giving you an easy look at artwork from the game whenever you want as you play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Maid Cafe - Artbook App

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
